title: Designing STEM Experiment-Based Mathematics Education Using Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Strengthening STEM problem-solving skills linked to daily life through experiment-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model physical phenomena (e.g., sound waves, acceleration) using smartphone sensor data.
Learners can process collected experimental data with analysis tools (free apps, etc.) and generate statistical graphs.
Learners can collaboratively interpret experimental results, apply them to real-world problems, and write/publish reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
